page.title: 08UPWOOD CHURCH (PART 2)
page.content: Parts of the church have been there since eleven hundred.The church wasn't there till after the Domesday book was made but there was one where the new one is.Nearly all the people who died in Upwood House have stones marking their names near the Altar.There is supposed to be a passage from Upwood House to the Church or to a possible monastery.The last person to be buried was in 1981 but no_one is allowed to be buried there now.There is a place where people who got the plague were buried.The money from services goes towards repairing the Church.The vicar is called Mr.Schofield.One day one of the services was interrupted by a bat in distress. By Duncan Tim Peter & Tom
